definition: variant of 厄運|厄运[e4 yun4]

sentences.english: According to superstition, breaking a mirror brings seven years of bad luck.
sentences.chinese: 有個迷信說法是打破了鏡子會帶來七年的噩運。

sentences.english: Some believe that men who are buried alone will bring bad luck on the families for future generations.
sentences.chinese: 一些人認爲單獨下葬的男人會給後代帶來噩運。

sentences.english: A hat on a bed will bring bad luck.
sentences.chinese: 牀上的帽子會帶來噩運。

sentences.english: Bad luck may befall to anyone at any time.
sentences.chinese: 任何人任何時候都可能交噩運倒黴。

sentences.english: A stroke of fate hit those nine persons in their sleep.
sentences.chinese: 噩運臨到了睡夢中的這九個人。

sentences.english: First we push the bad luck away, then we put the good things in.
sentences.chinese: 也就是說先把噩運推走，然後把好運拉進來。

sentences.english: Here's hoping I've used up all my howlers for this season.
sentences.chinese: 希望這個賽季我所有的噩運都在這裏耗盡了。

sentences.english: Some of the sailors began to murmur about it bringing bad luck.
sentences.chinese: 一些水手開始低聲說這帶來了噩運。

sentences.english: The fate of the wait for it is extremely sad, is not luck.
sentences.chinese: 等待它的命運卻是極其可悲的，可謂噩運難逃。
